column5: Could someone give me directions heading from Niagra to Toronto on the QEW to the ETR (403) to 400 north. Where do you get on the ETR from the QEW? None of the maps I have seen have the new ETR on them.
You can get on the ETR at Burlington, this section just opened in the summer.
We picked up 403 by the Ford Motor plant, it's easy to miss so be careful hope this helps.
